description:
The 14-year old protagonist of Tristia.
She is the granddaughter of the renowned inventor Prospero Flanca. Prospero`s name was well-known all over the world as an inventor and builder, and she is keen to uphold the name.
She came from the Imperial Capital with Stuka, an artificial creature, and Tenzan, a mech-styled golem.
name: Nanoca Flanka
